description.en:
### I Love You

Three little words—say them and she’s yours.

(Source: J18)

1. Goukaku Ecchi!  
2. Summer and Innocence / Natsu to Jun (夏と純) - A simple and sweet story of two young people who like each other, but need a push from the summer festival fireworks to take things to the next level.
3. Koiseyo Otome  
4. Kago no Mushi, Kumo o Shitau.  
5. I Love You. / Daisuki. (大好き)  
6. No Doubt, Even Better Than Sis… / Kitto Onee-chan Yori…
7. Succuties / Sakyutto!
8. Did Something Good Happen? / Nanka Ii Koto Atta? (なんかイイことあった？)  - [Mini non-hentai sequel](https://twitter.com/freeskecth555/status/1062743916296921089)
9. Danchou, Onegaishimasu!  
10. Will you marry me?
